p: ZIKV incidence and medical complications associated with infection have increased rapidly in the Americas, and the scientific community is attempting to catch up ( Waddell & Greig, 2016). There is much we do not yet understand about the details of the ZIKV transmission cycle. Emphasis has been placed on Aedes mosquitoes as primary vectors, but there are other species that potentially could contribute to the transmission cycle in important ways ( Pujhari & Rasgon, 2016; Waddell & Greig, 2016).
